free-scroll.name: Free Scroll
free-scroll.description: Lets you drag the editor without being constrained to the bounds. Use this if Free Scroll in your mod menu stops working when using this mod.

place-over.name: Place Over
place-over.description: Lets you place the same object on top of itself. Use this if Place Over in your mod menu stops working when using this mod.

infinite-width.name: Infinite Width
infinite-width.description: Sets the editor width to be infinite (overrides custom width).

infinite-height.name: Infinite Height
infinite-height.description: Sets the editor height to be infinite (overrides custom height).

min-x.name: Minimum X
min-x.description: Sets the minimum x to a specific value.

min-y.name: Minimum Y
min-y.description: Sets the minimum y to a specific value.

max-width.name: Max Width
max-width.description: Sets the editor width to a specific value.

max-height.name: Max Height
max-height.description: Sets the editor height to a specific value.
